How secure is my data when using your fo: Our form submission service includes several security features to ensure the protection of your data, including JSON schema validation, POST request origin validation, and reCaptcha support.
Can I add attachments to my form submiss: Yes, you can allow users to attach files to their form submissions. The maximum size for attachments is 10 MB.
Can I collaborate with other users on m: Yes, our form submission service includes collaborator support, which allows you to invite other users to view and manage your form submissions. This can be useful for teams working on a project together or for sharing form submissions with clients or stakeholders.
